short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to modify the appearance of a web page using contrast, saturation and hue filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
unDalton is an extension that aims to facilitate the viewing of all types of web pages for people with perceptual disorders and in particular color blindness. 

Thanks to unDalton, it is possible to adjust the hue, contrast and saturation of colors present on a web page to adapt it to each level of perception. Each of these adjustments is modulable with a slider.

This extension was developed for a school project.
